insert yarn or thread & smaller size hook hook from back to front to back around post of next st yo & pull up a lp yo & pull yarn materials through 2 lps on hook red heart super saver yarn or any other front post single_crochet fpsc - insert worsted weight yarn medium / 4 hook from front to back to front around post tapestry needle & straight pins of next st yo & pull up a lp yo & pull yarn from hook single_crochet in direction indicator next 7 chs 5 single_crochet in last chain work across the bottom of foundation chain --> single_crochet in color each row is highlighted in next 6 chs
